get.summary: Get a list of offers for addon services for the specified guest stay details.
get.description:
With the addons request you can get a list of offers for addon services available for a specific rate, room type
            and guest stay details.The channel code will define which rates will be returned based on the access control 
            configuration for related rates.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Specifies the hotel id to request offers for.

parameters.name: arrivalDate
parameters.description: Date from when the addon service will be booked to the reservation in the ISO-8601 format "YYYY-MM-DD".

parameters.name: departureDate
parameters.description:
Date until when the addon service will be booked to the reservation in the ISO-8601 format "YYYY-MM-DD".
            This is usually the departure date of the reservation.

parameters.name: channelCode
parameters.description: Channel Code the rate plan needs to be configured for.

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: Number of adults per room.

parameters.name: rooms
parameters.description: Number of rooms.

parameters.name: roomType
parameters.description: Only return offers for the specified room type code.

parameters.name: ratePlanCode
parameters.description: Only return offers for the specified rate plan code.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Expand the rates breakdown if required.

200.description: All addon offers for the requested stay details.

401.description: You provided wrong credentials, or you reached your API limit.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.

422.description:
The request failed to validate. Either a mandatory parameter was missing or no offers for 
            the requested stay details

500.description: We caught an unexpected error on our side. Please report with providing the Hetras-Tracking-Id from the response headers and we will check the logfiles.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

get.summary: Gets the availability and occupancy for a specific hotel and timespan.
get.description: Read past occupancy and future availability for a specific hotel. You can also request the breakdown per room type.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Specifies the hotel id to request the availability for.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Defines the first business day you would like to get availability numbers for.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Defines the last business day you would like to get availability numbers for. The maximum time span between fromÂ´and to is limited to 365 days.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: You can expand the room types breakdown per business day for the availibility numbers if need be.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Amount of items to skip.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Amount of items to select.

parameters.name: inlinecount
parameters.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

200.description: Returns a list of availabilities per business day.

400.description: Bad request. Request parameters syntactically erroneous.

401.description: You provided wrong credentials, or you reached your API limit.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.

500.description: We caught an unexpected error on our side. Please report with providing the Hetras-Tracking-Id from the response headers and we will check the logfiles.

get.description:
With this endpoint you can request a list of blocks for the hotel chain. Currently we only support to optionally
            filter by the group code linked to the block. Additional filters will be available soon.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Only return blocks for this specific hotel.

parameters.name: groupCode
parameters.description: Filter the blocks by the specified group code

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return all blocks where the block's last_departure is greater than specified date.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return all blocks where the block's last_departure is less than specified date.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Return all blocks where the block status is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: ratePlanCodes
parameters.description: Return all blocks that have related the specified comma-separated rate plans.

parameters.name: countDetails
parameters.description: If true it will include also details of block count per each room type.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Amount of items to skip.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Amount of items to select.

parameters.name: inlinecount
parameters.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

200.description: Returns a list of blocks matching the provided filter criteria.

204.description: There are no blocks matching your filter criteria.

400.description: Bad request. Request parameters syntactically erroneous.

401.description: You provided wrong credentials, or you reached your API limit.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.

500.description: We caught an unexpected error on our side. Please report with providing the Hetras-Tracking-Id from the response headers and we will check the logfiles.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

get.summary: Get total blocks count that match the given filter criteria.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Only return blocks for this specific hotel.

parameters.name: groupCode
parameters.description: Filter the blocks by the specified group code

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return all blocks where the block's last_departure is greater than specified date.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return all blocks where the block's last_departure is less than specified date.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Return all blocks where the block status is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: ratePlanCodes
parameters.description: Return all blocks that have related the specified comma-separated rate plans.

parameters.name: countDetails
parameters.description: If true it will include also details of block count per each room type.

200.description: The total blocks count for a given filter criteria.

401.description: You provided wrong credentials, or you reached your API limit.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

500.description: We couldn't return the representation due to an internal server error.

get.summary: Gets the details for a specific block.
get.description: Read all informationen about a block including the numbers of blocked rooms per room type and business day.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: blockCode
parameters.description:
Specifies the block code. The block code is composed of the hotel code, a dash and the block code 
            as shown in the hetras UI.

200.description: Returns you all details for the specific block.

400.description: Bad request. Request parameters syntactically erroneous.

401.description: You provided wrong credentials, or you reached your API limit.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.

500.description: We caught an unexpected error on our side. Please report with providing the Hetras-Tracking-Id from the response headers and we will check the logfiles.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

get.summary: Find bookings matching the given filter criteria.
get.description:
Here you can easily find bookings matching various criteria. The booking you are looking for has to fullfill all the specified criteria
            at the same time. So if you specify a customer name and a channel code you will get all bookings where the firstname or lastname of a guest or a 
            contact contains the specified value and that have been done through the defined channel.
            A booking can consist of multiple reservations, so even if you are looking for a specific reservation which is part of a multi-room booking you will get
            all reservations for this booking returned.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Only return bookings for this specific hotel.

parameters.name: cancellationId
parameters.description: Return bookings for this cancellation id.

parameters.name: reservationNumber
parameters.description:
Return bookings matching this reservation number. Please note that reservation numbers are only unique within a hotel. If you
            donÂ´t specify a hotel filter at the same time you could get back multiple bookings from different hotels.

parameters.name: customerName
parameters.description:
Return all bookings where the first or lastname of one of the guests or the contact contains the specified value. The search is executed case insensitive
            and also stripping of any whitespaces.

parameters.name: customerEmail
parameters.description:
Return all bookings where the primary email address of one of the guests or the contact contains the specified value. The search is executed case insensitive
            and also stripping of any whitespaces.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Return all bookings the id of one of the guests or the contact matches the specified value.

parameters.name: roomNumber
parameters.description: Return all bookings having the specified room number assigned.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: Return all bookings exactly matching the specified external id. This filter is case sensitive.

parameters.name: companyName
parameters.description:
Return all bookings where the name of the linked company or travel agent profile contains the specified value. The search is executed case insensitive
            and also stripping of any whitespaces.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Return all bookings the id of the company or travel agent profile matches the specified value.

parameters.name: companyEmail
parameters.description:
Return all bookings where the primary email address of the company or the travel agent profile contains the specified value. The search is executed case insensitive
            and also stripping of any whitespaces.

parameters.name: blockCode
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the block code matches the specified value.

parameters.name: reservationStatuses
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the reservation status is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: marketCodes
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the market code is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: channelCodes
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the channel code is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: subChannelCodes
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the subchannel code is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: roomTypes
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the room type is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: ratePlanCodes
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the rate plan code is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Return all reservations with at least one of the specified labels.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
Start date for the selected date filter. If you select arrival date as date filter the bookings returned will have at least
            one reservation arriving on the specified date or later.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
End date for the selected date filter. If you select arrival date as date filter the bookings returned will have at least
            one reservation arriving on the specified date or earlier.

parameters.name: dateFilter
parameters.description:
Select a date field you want to filter bookings by. Only one filter at a time can be applied. The to and from dates
            will then define the time range.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: To be able to request reservations without personal data based on GDPR.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Amount of items to skip.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Amount of items to select.

parameters.name: inlinecount
parameters.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

200.description: A list of reservations for the requested hotel identifier.

204.description: There are no bookings matching your filter criteria.

401.description: You provided wrong credentials, or you reached your API limit.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.

500.description: We caught an unexpected error on our side. Please report with providing the Hetras-Tracking-Id from the response headers and we will check the logfiles.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

post.description:
Create a new booking as defined in the requests payload. You can get more information about the payload if you check out the documentation for the reservation request model.
Please also have a look at the Tutorials.
For more details on how the API responds to errors please check our documentation on Error Handling.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: sendConfirmation
parameters.description: Whether to send a confirmation email to the primary guest

requestBody.description: Specifies the details of the booking to be created.

201.description:
The creation of the booking was successful. You will get back the confirmation id and maybe warnings, if
            e.g. the prepayment could not be captured.

401.description: You provided wrong credentials, or you reached your API limit.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.

500.description: We caught an unexpected error on our side. Please report with providing the Hetras-Tracking-Id from the response headers and we will check the logfiles.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

Get the count of all bookings matching your criteria. The bookings have to fullfill all the specified criteria
            at the same time. So if you specify a customer name and a channel code you will get the count for all bookings where the firstname or lastname 
            of a guest or a contact contains the specified value and that have been done through the defined channel.

            donÂ´t specify a hotel filter at the same time you could get back multiple bookings from different hotels.

parameters.name: companyName

Return all bookings where the name of the linked company or travel agent profile contains the specified value. The search is executed case insensitive

parameters.name: companyId

parameters.name: companyEmail

Return all bookings where the primary email address of the company or the travel agent profile contains the specified value. The search is executed case insensitive

parameters.name: blockCode
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the block code matches the specified value.

parameters.name: reservationStatuses

parameters.name: channelCodes
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the channel code is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: subChannelCodes
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the subchannel code is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: roomTypes
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the room type is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: ratePlanCodes
parameters.description: Return all bookings where the rate plan code is one of the specified values.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Return all reservations with at least one of the specified labels.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
Start date for the selected date filter. If you select arrival date as date filter the bookings returned will have at least

parameters.name: dateFilter
parameters.description:
Select a date field you want to filter bookings by. Only one filter at a time can be applied. The to and from dates
            will then define the time range.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: To be able to request reservations without personal data based on GDPR.

200.description: The total booking count for a given filter criteria.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

get.summary: Load all reservations for one booking by confirmation id.
get.description:
A booking groups all reservations done in one single request and can be identified by the confirmation id.
            Guests usually use the confirmation id to check in at the kiosk, on the website or mobile device. In hetras
            all reservations of one booking share the room type, rate plan and number of guests per room.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: confirmationId
parameters.description: The confirmation id for the booking to load.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Specifies the expand type.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specifies the exclude type.

200.description: Returns a list of all reservations for that booking.

401.description: You provided wrong credentials, or you reached your API limit.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.

post.summary: Assign a room to a reservation.
post.description:
By default this API call assigns a random room, which has the proper room type, is not already assigned to another reservation or has any maintenance status set for the stay period of the underlying reservation. If the arrival date for the underlying reservation is the current business day dirty rooms are excluded by default. For reservation arriving on any latter day the room condition is not taken into account.
By specifiying the room selection criteria in the request body you can influence which room will be assigned. See the request model for further details.
For more details on how the API responds to errors please check our documentation on Error Handling.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: confirmationId
parameters.description: The confirmation id for the booking the reservation was made.

parameters.name: reservationNumber
parameters.description: Specifies the reservation number for the reservation the room should be assigned to.

requestBody.description: Specifies the criteria for the room selection.

200.description: The room assignment was successful. The Reponse would contain the room number assigned.

401.description: You provided wrong credentials, or you reached your API limit.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.

422.description: The request failed to validate. The reason could be no available rooms or a mismatch of room types etc.

500.description: We caught an unexpected error on our side. Please report with providing the Hetras-Tracking-Id from the response headers and we will check the logfiles.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

post.description:
This request will cancel one specific reservation. It will show up in the hetras UI in the Cancellation and NoShow processing screen and it will be up to the hotel staff to either charge or waive the cancellation fee.
For more details on how the API responds to errors please check our documentation on Error Handling.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: confirmationId
parameters.description: The confirmation id for the booking the reservation was made.

parameters.name: reservationNumber
parameters.description: Specifies the reservation number for the reservation to cancel.

parameters.name: sendConfirmation
parameters.description: Whether to send a confirmation email to the primary guest

200.description: Returns the cancellation id and the cancellation fee that will be charged to the folio of the reservation.

404.description: Not Found. The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.

500.description: We caught an unexpected error on our side. Please report with providing the Hetras-Tracking-Id from the response headers and we will check the logfiles.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

post.summary: Performs a check in operation for a reservation.
post.description:
With this call you can set a reservation to the status inhouse. It allows only single room reservations to be checked in. The reservation must have assigned a vacant and clean room.
For more details on how the API responds to errors please check our documentation on Error Handling.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: confirmationId
parameters.description: The confirmation id for the booking the reservation was made.

parameters.name: reservationNumber
parameters.description: Specifies the reservation number for the reservation to be checked in.

requestBody.description: Specifies checkIn details, for example Client Identity.

get.summary: Get a list of daily rates given a hotel Id, a channel code and a date range.
get.description:
With the rates request you can get a list of different daily rates. You will have to at least 
            specify the hotel, the channel code, and a calendar range. The channel code will define which rates will be 
            returned based on the access control configuration for the rates. Additionally rate plan codes may be specified in
            the request in order to limit only those rates of the given plans, if they are not specified, it will return all the public rate plans.
            If requested the caller may specify whether he wants policies or not.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Define the hotel id to request the availability for.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Define the first business day you would like to get availability numbers for. The day should not be in the past.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Define the last business day you would like to get rates for (inclusive). The maximum time span between 'From' and 'To' is limited to 365 days. This can't be less than the 'From' date.

parameters.name: channelCode
parameters.description: Define the channel code in order to look up the rates for.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Define the sections you want to expand and get informed about rates for.

parameters.name: ratePlanCodes
parameters.description: Define the codes of rate plans to show in the response. A list of comma ',' separated rate plan codes.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Amount of items to skip.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Amount of items to select.

parameters.name: inlinecount
parameters.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

200.description: Different rates for the requested stay details grouped by room type.

204.description: When there are no data to return.

400.description: The request failed to validate. One of the missing request parameters was missing or their value was wrong.

401.description: You provided wrong credentials, or you reached your API limit.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI. This code will not be returned when there are no data to return for (please see 204).

409.description: When an error occurs which prevent the API to return a response and is normally cause by bad input.

500.description: We caught an unexpected error on our side. Please report with providing the Hetras-Tracking-Id from the response headers and we will check the logfiles.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

get.summary: Get a list of room offers for the specified guest stay details.
get.description:
With the rates request you can get a list of different rate offers per room type. You will have to at least 
            specify the hotel, the arrival and departure date, number of adults per room and the channel code. The channel code
            will define which rates will be returned based on the access control configuration for the rates.

parameters.name: App-Id
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: App-Key
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Specifies the hotel id to request offers for.

parameters.name: arrivalDate
parameters.description: Date of arrival for the guest in the ISO-8601 format "YYYY-MM-DD".

parameters.name: departureDate
parameters.description: Date of departure for the guest in the ISO-8601 format "YYYY-MM-DD".

parameters.name: channelCode
parameters.description: Channel Code the rate plan needs to be configured for.

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: Number of adults per room.

parameters.name: rooms
parameters.description: Number of rooms (default is 1).

parameters.name: roomType
parameters.description: Only return offers with rates for the specified room type code.

parameters.name: ratePlanCode
parameters.description: Only return offers for the specified room type code.

parameters.name: groupCode
parameters.description: Only return offers for the specified group code.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Expand the rates breakdown if required.

200.description: Different rates for the requested stay details grouped by room type.

401.description: You provided wrong credentials, or you reached your API limit.

403.description: The application does not have access to the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI. It is also used if there are no rates available for the specified guest stay details.

422.description:
The request failed to validate. Either a mandatory parameter was missing or no offers for 
            the requested stay details

500.description: We caught an unexpected error on our side. Please report with providing the Hetras-Tracking-Id from the response headers and we will check the logfiles.

503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try later.

accepted.description:
In this list you find all the accepted guarantee types for this offer. They are sorted in ascending
            order.

minimum.description:
Based on the rateplan a reservation does need to have a minimum guarantee. When you create a new booking you
            can always use a higher guarantee type starting from the minimum. If you do not specify a guarantee when creating
            a new booking using this offer this guarantee type will be used by default. See 
            https://developer.hetras.com/docs/tutorials#payment for information about guarantee types and payment details

breakdown.description:
In this collection you will get an entry with price information for every day the addon service will be charged
            to the folio of the reservation if the addon service is booked.

code.description: The code of the addon service

description.description: The description of the addon service

frequency.description:
The frequency this addon service will be charged to the reservation. This field is a string that can be displayed,
            but is not supposed to be used for computation

name.description: The name of the addon service

rate_mode.description:
The price for an addon service can be per person or per room. All the prices in an offer are already calculated
            for all rooms and number of persons per room. Based on this attribute you will be able to know how to calculate
            the price per person and room, per room or per person depending on your needs.

business_day.description: The business day the price for the addon service will be posted to the folio of the reservation

currency.description: The currency the addon service will be charged in.

included_tax.description:
The amount of taxes already included in the gross rate of the addon service also calculated for all rooms and
            all persons.

rate.description: The gross rate of the addon service. It is the price calculated for all rooms and all persons.

currency.description: The currency the addon service will be charged in.

included_tax.description:
The amount of taxes already included in the gross rate of the addon service also calculated for all rooms and
            all persons.

rate.description: The gross rate of the addon service. It is the price calculated for all rooms and all persons.

business_day.description: The business day the addon service should be charged

code.description: The code of the addon service to be booked

rate.description: Total gross amount for the service

addon_services.description: A collection of offers for addon services.

adults.description: The number of adults per room the addon offers are requested for. The rates will then already reflects this.

arrival_date.description: The arrival date of the reservation the addon offers are supposed to be booked on.

departure_date.description: The departure date of the reservation the addon offers are supposed to be booked on.

hotel_id.description: The id of the hotel the addon offers will be valid for

hotel_name.description: The name of the hotel the addon offers will be valid for

rooms.description: The number of rooms the addon offers are requested for. The rates will then already reflects this.

amenities.description: Ensure the assigned room will have all the amenities specified. You can provide a comma seperated list of amenity codes.

condition.description:
Here you can define to limit the list of assignable rooms based on their current condition. This is only applicable if the underlying reservation
            is due to arrive on the current business day. If not set by default only clean rooms will be assigned.

include_out_of_service.description:
Sometimes you might want to assign rooms which are out of service (small repair needed) if no other rooms are available anymore. If you set
            include_out_of_service to true even those rooms will be considered. The default is false.

locations.description: Ensure the assigned room will have at least one of the specified locations. You can provide a comma seperated list of location codes.

respect_guest_preferences.description:
Defines if the preferences for locations, amenities and views of the primary guest should be taken into account. All defined preferences in the guest
            profile override any of the criteria defined in the request body. The default is false.

room_number.description:
If you define a specific room number this room will be assigned if not assigned to another reservation, has proper room type and is not OutOfOrder 
            or OutOfInventory for the stay duration of the underlying reservaton. If set all other filter criteria will be ignored.

views.description: Ensure the assigned room will have at least one of the specified views. You can provide a comma seperated list of view codes.

AssignRoomCriteria.description: Represents a set of criteria for assigning a room

_warnings.description:
Warnings that came up when your request was processed. Your request will still be processed successfull when
            you see such warnings in your response

AssignRoomResponse.description: Defines the response for room assignment operation

no_authorization_required.description:
Whether hetras should skip authorization using the provided token when no authorization details are supplied.
            Optional flag, defaults to false.

payment_token.description: The token you get from the payment service provider

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

available.description:
The number of rooms that were originally available to sell. This is the the house count reduced by rooms set
            to OutOfOrder but increased by the set overbooking

day_use.description: The number of day use reservations

house_count.description: The total count of physical rooms reduced by the number of rooms set to OutOfInventory

room_count.description: The total count of physical rooms

sold.description: The count of rooms sold. It sums up the rooms sold through individual reservations plus rooms blocked definitely

to_sell.description: The number of rooms still available to sell. It is available reduced by the already sold rooms

_count.description: The number of items matching your request in total for all pages.

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

daily_availabilities.description: The list of availability numbers per business day

_warnings.description:
Warnings that came up when your request was processed. Your request will still be processed successfull when
            you see such warnings in your response

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

code.description:
The code is composed of the hotel code a dash and the block code shown in the hetras UI. An 
            example block code on the API for a block with code TRAVEL1 defined for the hotel with code ABC would 
            be ABC-TRAVEL1

countDetails.description: If true it will include also details of block count per each room type.

from.description: Return all blocks where the block's last_departure is greater than specified date.

groupCode.description: Filter the blocks by the specified group code

hotelId.description: Only return blocks for this specific hotel.

ratePlanCodes.description: Return all blocks that have related the specified comma-separated rate plans.

status.description: Return all blocks where the block status is one of the specified values.

to.description: Return all blocks where the block's last_departure is less than specified date.

remaining.description: Number of definitely blocked rooms not picked up

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

confirmation_id.description:
The confirmation id for the booking which the guest can use to check in on the kiosk, add the
            booking to the mobile app etc. It is used as identifier for all reservations done with the same
            booking request.

reservations.description: Collection of reservations made with on booking request.

updated.description: Timestamp of when the booking was changed the last time

blockCode.description: Return all bookings where the block code matches the specified value.

cancellationId.description: Return bookings for this cancellation id.

channelCodes.description: Return all bookings where the channel code is one of the specified values.

companyEmail.description:
Return all bookings where the primary email address of the company or the travel agent profile contains the specified value. The search is executed case insensitive
            and also stripping of any whitespaces.

companyId.description: Return all bookings the id of the company or travel agent profile matches the specified value.

companyName.description:
Return all bookings where the name of the linked company or travel agent profile contains the specified value. The search is executed case insensitive
            and also stripping of any whitespaces.

customerEmail.description:
Return all bookings where the primary email address of one of the guests or the contact contains the specified value. The search is executed case insensitive
            and also stripping of any whitespaces.

customerId.description: Return all bookings the id of one of the guests or the contact matches the specified value.

customerName.description:
Return all bookings where the first or lastname of one of the guests or the contact contains the specified value. The search is executed case insensitive
            and also stripping of any whitespaces.

dateFilter.description:
Select a date field you want to filter bookings by. Only one filter at a time can be applied. The to and from dates
            will then define the time range.

exclude.description: To be able to request reservations without personal data based on GDPR.

externalId.description: Return all bookings exactly matching the specified external id. This filter is case sensitive.

from.description:
Start date for the selected date filter. If you select arrival date as date filter the bookings returned will have at least
            one reservation arriving on the specified date or later.

hotelId.description: Only return bookings for this specific hotel.

labels.description: Return all reservations with at least one of the specified labels.

marketCodes.description: Return all bookings where the market code is one of the specified values.

ratePlanCodes.description: Return all bookings where the rate plan code is one of the specified values.

reservationNumber.description:
Return bookings matching this reservation number. Please note that reservation numbers are only unique within a hotel. If you
            donÂ´t specify a hotel filter at the same time you could get back multiple bookings from different hotels.

reservationStatuses.description: Return all bookings where the reservation status is one of the specified values.

roomNumber.description: Return all bookings having the specified room number assigned.

roomTypes.description: Return all bookings where the room type is one of the specified values.

subChannelCodes.description: Return all bookings where the subchannel code is one of the specified values.

to.description:
End date for the selected date filter. If you select arrival date as date filter the bookings returned will have at least
            one reservation arriving on the specified date or earlier.

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

adults.description: The number of adults per room

arrival_date.description: The arrival date of the guests

balance.description:
The balance for all folios of this reservartion. It is calculated by all already charged room and service rates plus manual charges 
            or charges from other systems like POS minus all payments. A negative balance indicates the reservation is overpaid, a positive balance 
            that the guest owes the hotel money

block_code.description: If this reservation is a pick-up from a block you will see the appropriate block code here

cancellation_id.description: The cancellation id if the reservation has been cancelled

channel_code.description:
The code of the channel that was used when the booking has been created. It is also known as source. 
            Possible values can be OTA, GDS or DIRECT, but it is configurable per hotel

departure_date.description: The departure date of the guests

external_id.description:
The external id for this reservation is the unique identifier from the system that created the booking in hetras. It could be the id of an
            OTA like Expedia or booking.com or one of the GDS systems like Amadeus or Galileo

labels.description: The labels attached to this reservation.

market_code.description: The code of the market segment the rate plan for this reservation is linked to

reservation_number.description: The reservation number of the reservation

reservation_status.description: The current status of this reservation

rooms.description:
The number of rooms this reservation is valid for. After a multi-room booking is done there will be 
            one reservation in hetras for this booking for all rooms. The hotel staff then will split this reservation into
            one reservation per room to be able to check in the guests

subchannel_code.description:
The code of the subchannel that was used when the booking has been created. Possible values can be 
            BOOKING, EXPEDIA or WALKIN, but it is configurable per hotel

updated.description: Timestamp of when the reservation was changed the last time

_count.description: The number of items matching your request in total for all pages.

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

bookings.description: Collection of bookings that match the defined filter criteria.

description.description: Description of the cancellation policy suitable for displaying to customers

fee.description: The fee a guest has to pay when cancelling the reservation

fee_date.description: The date and time in UTC from when the fee has to be paid in case of cancellation

_warnings.description:
Warnings that came up when your request was processed. Your request will still be processed successfull when
            you see such warnings in your response

balance.description: The current balance on the reservations folio without the cancellation fee

cancellation_fee.description:
The fee that might be charged to the folio of the reservation. The cancelled reservation will
            show up in the cancellation and no show processing screen and the hotel staff will either charge
            the fee or waive it.

cancellation_id.description: The id of the successful cancellation. With this id the hotel staff will be able to find the reservation

company_id.description:
The id of a company profile. The id is build out of the Supplier Code a dash and the profile id
            shown in the hetras UI. An example id on the API for a profile with id 12345 on the level of supplier ABC 
            would be ABC-12345

customer_id.description:
The id of a customer profile. The id is build out of the Supplier Code a dash and the profile id
            shown in the hetras UI. An example id on the API for a profile with id 12345 on the level of supplier ABC 
            would be ABC-12345

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

customer_id.description:
The id of a customer profile. The id is build out of the Supplier Code a dash and the profile id
            shown in the hetras UI. An example id on the API for a profile with id 12345 on the level of supplier ABC 
            would be ABC-12345

consent_subscribe.description: The list of consents which the customer is subscribing

consent_unsubscribe.description: The list of consents which the customer is unsubscribing

customer_id.description:
The id of a customer profile. The id is build out of the Supplier Code a dash and the profile id
            shown in the hetras UI. An example id on the API for a profile with id 12345 on the level of supplier ABC 
            would be ABC-12345

email.description: The primary email address of the guest

nationality.description:
The nationality of the guest in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format
            (see: http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes/iso_3166_code_lists/country_names_and_code_elements.htm)

phone.description: The primary phone number of the guest

primary.description: Defines if the guest is the primary guest of the reservation

title.description: Title of the guest. Needs to be taken from the available titles defined in the codes

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

customer_id.description:
The id of a customer profile. The id is build out of the Supplier Code a dash and the profile id
            shown in the hetras UI. An example id on the API for a profile with id 12345 on the level of supplier ABC 
            would be ABC-12345

email.description: The primary email address of the guest

nationality.description:
The nationality of the guest in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format
            (see: http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes/iso_3166_code_lists/country_names_and_code_elements.htm)

phone.description: The primary phone number of the guest

primary.description: Defines if the guest is the primary guest of the reservation

subscribed_consents.description: Gets or sets the list of consents subscribed by customer

title.description: Title of the guest. Needs to be taken from the available titles defined in the codes

guests.description: A list of guest details for this reservation

business_day.description: The business day the following availability numbers are shown for

room_types.description: The availability numbers for all room types if the expand parameter is set appropriately

addon_services.description: List of addon services with additional price information.

date.description: Date the room rate will be charged to the folio

excluded_tax.description: The amount of extra taxes also calculated for all rooms and all persons per room.

included_services.description: List of codes for all services already included in the gross rate

included_tax.description:
The amount of taxes already included in the gross nightly rate also calculated for all rooms and
            all persons per room.

rate.description: The gross room rate. It is the price calculated for all rooms and all persons per room.

room_type.description: Code of the room type which is booked for that day

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources
Collection of links to related resources
Collection of links to related resources
Collection of links to related resources

unavailable_reason.description: If there is an issue and this room offer is unavailable (IsAvailable=false) this message may be not empty.

_count.description: The number of items matching your request in total for all pages.

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

amount.description: Deposit amount that has to be paid

description.description: Description of the deposit policy suitable for displaying to customers

due_date.description: Date the deposit amount has to be paid latest

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

EmbeddedRoom.description:
Represents a short version of room information. To get the full version
            please follow the self link from the links collection

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

EmbeddedRoomType.description:
Basic data for a room type. To get the full details please follow the self link
            from the links collection

description.description: Description of the general policy suitable for displaying to customers

arrivalDate.description: Date from when the addon service will be booked to the reservation in the ISO-8601 format "YYYY-MM-DD".

channelCode.description: Channel Code the rate plan needs to be configured for.

departureDate.description:
Date until when the addon service will be booked to the reservation in the ISO-8601 format "YYYY-MM-DD".
            This is usually the departure date of the reservation.

expand.description: Expand the rates breakdown if required.

hotelId.description: Specifies the hotel id to request offers for.

ratePlanCode.description: Only return offers for the specified rate plan code.

roomType.description: Only return offers for the specified room type code.

expand.description: You can expand the room types breakdown per business day for the availibility numbers if need be.

from.description: Defines the first business day you would like to get availability numbers for.

hotelId.description: Specifies the hotel id to request the availability for.

to.description: Defines the last business day you would like to get availability numbers for. The maximum time span between fromÂ´and to is limited to 365 days.

channelCode.description: Define the channel code in order to look up the rates for.

expand.description: Define the sections you want to expand and get informed about rates for.

from.description: Define the first business day you would like to get availability numbers for. The day should not be in the past.

hotelId.description: Define the hotel id to request the availability for.

ratePlanCodes.description: Define the codes of rate plans to show in the response. A list of comma ',' separated rate plan codes.

to.description: Define the last business day you would like to get rates for (inclusive). The maximum time span between 'From' and 'To' is limited to 365 days. This can't be less than the 'From' date.

guarantee_type.description: One of the accepted guarantee types from the offer you selected out of the rates response
The guarantee type of the reservation

valid_token.description:
Tells you if there is a token for a valid creadit card on the reservation that can be used to
            capture the reservations amount or to guarantee for the reservation

code.description: Hotel Code which is also called property or component code

deprecation.description:
<para>The "deprecation" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para>Â </para>
<para>Its presence indicates that the link is to be deprecated (i.e.
            removed) at a future date.  Its value is a URL that SHOULD provide
            further information about the deprecation.
            A client SHOULD provide some notification (for example, by logging a
            warning message) whenever it traverses over a link that has this
            property.  The notification SHOULD include the deprecation property's
            value so that a client maintainer can easily find information about
            the deprecation.</para>

href.description:
<para>The "href" property is REQUIRED.</para>
<para>Â </para>
<para>Its value is either a URI [RFC3986] or a URI Template [RFC6570].
            If the value is a URI Template then the Link Object SHOULD have a
            "templated" attribute whose value is true.</para>

hreflang.description:
<para>The "hreflang" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para>Â </para>
<para>Its value is a string and is intended for indicating the language of
            the target resource (as defined by [RFC5988]).</para>

name.description:
<para>The "name" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para>Â </para>
<para>Its value MAY be used as a secondary key for selecting Link Objects
            which share the same relation type.</para>

profile.description:
<para>The "profile" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para>Â </para>
<para>Its value is a string which is a URI that hints about the profile.</para>

templated.description:
<para>The "templated" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para>Â </para>
<para>Its value is boolean and SHOULD be true when the Link Object's "href"
            property is a URI Template.
            Its value SHOULD be considered false if it is undefined or any other
            value than true.</para>

title.description:
<para>The "title" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para>Â </para>
<para>Its value is a string and is intended for labelling the link with a
            human-readable identifier (as defined by [RFC5988]).</para>

type.description:
<para>The "type" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para>Â </para>
<para>Its value is a string used as a hint to indicate the media type
            expected when dereferencing the target resource.</para>

LinkObject.description: A Link Object represents a hyperlink from the containing resource to a URI.

address.description: The address details like street, number, and other in free format

address_type.description: One of the values from the enumeration of allowed address types

city.description: The city name for this address

country.description: The country code for this address in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format (see: http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes/iso_3166_code_lists/country_names_and_code_elements.htm)

postal_code.description: The postal code for this address

out_of_inventory.description: Number of rooms set to OutOfInventory

out_of_order.description: Number of rooms set to OutOfOrder

out_of_service.description: Number of rooms set to OutOfService

description.description: Description of the noshow policy suitable for displaying to customers

fee.description: The fee that will be charged to the reservations folio in case the guest does not show up

_links.description: Link to request addon offers for this stay

adults.description: Number of adults the offer is calculated for

available_rooms.description: Number of currently available rooms for that specific offer

breakdown.description: In this collection you will get an entry with price information for every day.

cancellation_policies.description: List of cancellation policies defined for that rate

currency.description: The amounts of this offer are always in this currency

deposit_policies.description: List of Deposit policies defined for that rate

general_policies.description: List of general policies defined for that rate

included_services.description: A list of  of services included already in the rate for this offer

rate_plan_code.description: The code of the rate plan for this offer

inlinecount.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

device_id.description: The device id that will be put on the reservation

PreCheckInRequest.description: With this request you can execute a precheckin on a reservation

addon_services.description: List of addon services with additional price information.

excluded_tax.description: The amount of extra taxes also calculated for all rooms and all persons per room.

included_services.description: List of codes for all services already included in the gross rate

included_tax.description:
The amount of taxes already included in the gross nightly rate also calculated for all rooms and
            all persons per room.

rate.description: The gross room rate. It is the price calculated for all rooms and all persons per room.

description.description: Description of the rate plan suitable for being displayed to customers

arrival_date.description: The arrival date of the guest for this rate offer

departure_date.description: The departure date of the guest for this rate offer

hotel_id.description: The id of the hotel the rate offers will be valid for

hotel_name.description: The name of the hotel the rate offers will be valid for

rate_plans.description: List of rate plans details for rates you can find offers in the room_offers

room_offers.description: List of room types with available rate offers ordered from ascending

rooms.description: List of room type details for room types you can find offers in the room_offers

services.description: List of service details for included services in offers you can find in the room_offers

arrivalDate.description: Date of arrival for the guest in the ISO-8601 format "YYYY-MM-DD".

channelCode.description: Channel Code the rate plan needs to be configured for.

departureDate.description: Date of departure for the guest in the ISO-8601 format "YYYY-MM-DD".

expand.description: Expand the rates breakdown if required.

groupCode.description: Only return offers for the specified group code.

hotelId.description: Specifies the hotel id to request offers for.

ratePlanCode.description: Only return offers for the specified room type code.

roomType.description: Only return offers with rates for the specified room type code.

addons.description: A list of addon service codes that should be booked for all reservations of this booking

adults.description: The number of adults per room

arrival_date.description: The arrival date of the guests

channel_code.description: The channel code for this reservation. You can find available channels in the codes for the hotel.

comment.description: The comment you want to add for this reservation

departure_date.description: The departure date of the guests

external_id.description:
The external id for this reservation. You can put here your own id used by you or the external system
            you integrate hetras with

group_code.description: The group code based on which the reservation will be created.

guests.description: A list of guests with some basic guest details

hotel_id.description: The id of the hotel this reservation is valid for

payment_method.description: The payment method for this reservation

prepay_discount.description:
If you create a booking for a rateplan requiring prepayment this amount will be deducted from the booking value before
            the prepayment will be taken. This feature is useful when the booker redeems a gift voucher and you want to 
            only capture the remaining amount from the guestÂ´s credit card

rate_plan.description: The rate plan code this reservation is related to

room_type.description: The room type code this reservation is related to

rooms.description:
The number of rooms this reservation is for. After a multi-room booking is done there will be 
            one reservation in hetras for all rooms. The hotel staff then will split this reservation into
            one reservation per room to be able to check in the guests

_warnings.description:
Warnings that came up when your request was processed. Your request will still be processed successfull when
            you see such warnings in your response

confirmation_id.description:
The confirmation id for the newly created booking which the guest can use to check in on the kiosk, add the
            booking to the mobile app etc.

reservation_id.description: The reservation number of the newly created reservation

addon_rates.description: A breakdown of addon services with their prices for every stay day

adults.description: The number of adults per room

arrival_date.description: The arrival date of the guests

channel_code.description: The channel code for this reservation. You can find available channels in the codes for the hotel.

comment.description: The comment you want to add for this reservation

departure_date.description: The departure date of the guests

external_id.description:
The external id for this reservation. You can put here your own id used by you or the external system
            you integrate hetras with

group_code.description: The group code based on which the reservation will be created.

guests.description: A list of guests with some basic guest details

hotel_id.description: The id of the hotel this reservation is valid for

payment_method.description: The payment method for this reservation

prepay_discount.description:
If you create a booking for a rateplan requiring prepayment this amount will be deducted from the booking value before
            the prepayment will be taken. This feature is useful when the booker redeems a gift voucher and you want to 
            only capture the remaining amount from the guestÂ´s credit card

room_rates.description: A breakdown of room rates specified for every stay day

rooms.description:
The number of rooms this reservation is for. After a multi-room booking is done there will be 
            one reservation in hetras for all rooms. The hotel staff then will split this reservation into
            one reservation per room to be able to check in the guests

sendConfirmation.description: Whether to send a confirmation email to the primary guest

_warnings.description:
Warnings that came up when your request was processed. Your request will still be processed successfull when
            you see such warnings in your response

addon_services.description:
A list of addon service codes that are currently booked on the reservation. Services which are charged
            once per stay are only visible before and on the day they are booked for.

adults.description: The number of adults per room

arrival_date.description: The arrival date of the guests

balance.description:
The balance for all folios of this reservartion. It is calculated by all already charged room and service
            rates plus manual charges or charges from other systems like POS minus all payments. A negative balance
            indicates the reservation is overpaid, a positive balance that the guest owes the hotel money

cancellation_id.description: Given the reservation was cancelled, this field contains the cancellation id

cancellation_policies.description: The cancellation policies that were applicable on the date the booking was done

channel_code.description:
The code of the channel that was used when the booking has been created. It is also known as source. 
            Possible values can be OTA, GDS or DIRECT, but it is configurable per hotel

checkin_time.description: The real checkin time of the guests. It will be set after the checkin has been performed

checkout_time.description: The real checkout time of the guests. It will be set after the checkout has been performed

confirmation_id.description:
The confirmation id for the booking which the guest can use to check in on the kiosk, add the
            booking to the mobile app etc. It is used as identifier for all reservations done with the same
            booking request

currency.description: The currency all amounts of this reservation will be shown in

departure_date.description: The departure date of the guests

external_id.description:
The external id for this reservation is the unique identifier from the system that created the booking in hetras. It could be the id of an
            OTA like Expedia or booking.com or one of the GDS systems like Amadeus or Galileo

general_policies.description: The general policies that were applicable on the date the booking was done

guests.description: A list of guest details for this reservation

hotel_id.description: The id of the hotel this reservation is valid for

labels.description: A list of labels that are attached to the reservation.

market_code.description: The code of the market segment the rate plan for this reservation is linked to

payment_method.description: The payment method for this reservation

reservation_number.description: The reservation number of the reservation

reservation_status.description: The current status of this reservation

room_rates.description: The breakdown for all daily room rates and service charges for this reservation

rooms.description:
The number of rooms this reservation is valid for. After a multi-room booking is done there will be 
            one reservation in hetras for this booking for all rooms. The hotel staff then will split this reservation into
            one reservation per room to be able to check in the guests

services.description: A list of details for all services included and addon service booked on this reservation

subchannel_code.description:
The code of the subchannel that was used when the booking has been created. Possible values can be 
            BOOKING, EXPEDIA or WALKIN, but it is configurable per hotel

updated.description: Timestamp of when the reservation was changed the last time

description.description: The description of the room type

name.description: The name of the room type

room_number.description: The room number of the assigned room

type.description: The code of the room type

reservations.description: All reservations for the requested booking

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

available.description:
The number of rooms that were originally available to sell. This is the the house count reduced by rooms set
            to OutOfOrder but increased by the set overbooking

day_use.description: The number of day use reservations

default.description: Specifies if the room type is the default room type of the hotel

house_count.description: The total count of physical rooms reduced by the number of rooms set to OutOfInventory

room_count.description: The total count of physical rooms

sold.description: The count of rooms sold. It sums up the rooms sold through individual reservations plus rooms blocked definitely

to_sell.description: The number of rooms still available to sell. It is available reduced by the already sold rooms

number.description: Number of the room if one is assigned already

offers.description: A list of rate offers for the appropriate room type ordered by amount ascending

room_type.description: The room type all offers will be valid for

business_day.description: The business day the prize for the daily rate and all included services will be posted to the folio of the reservation

excluded_tax.description:
The amount of taxes that are not included in the gross rate of the room offer and will be charged separately for
            that business day. It is also calculated for all rooms and all persons per room

included_tax.description:
The amount of taxes already included in the gross rate of the room and all included services for this business day.
            The prize is calculated for all rooms and all persons per room

rate.description:
The gross rate for this day for the room and all included services. The prize is calculated for all rooms and all 
            persons per room

business_day.description: The business day the room rate will be charged

rate.description:
Total gross amount to be charged for the rate including all services of a package. Only extra taxes might
            be added to the booking on top

rate_plan.description: The rate plan code for the specified business day

room_type.description: The room type code for the specified business day

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

description.description: The description of the service which is suitable for displaying to customers

frequency.description:
The frequency for charging the service to the guests folio. It is a free text and only suitable for 
            displaying to customers

is_addon.description: This flag indicates if a service is an addon or is included already in the room rate

included_tax.description: The included taxes in the gross rate of the service calculated for all rooms and all persons

rate.description: The gross rate of the service calculated for all rooms and all persons

authorization_expiry_date.description: The authorization expiry date you got back from the payment service provider

authorization_reference.description:
The authorization reference. This value is specific for different payment service providers. There will be
            a page on the developer portal explaining the pattern on how to fill this value for the payment service
            provider hetras is integrated with

authorization_status.description: The authorization status you got back from the payment service provider

merchant_reference.description: The merchant reference you used when requesting the token from the payment service provider

shopper_email.description: The shopper email you used when requesting the token from the payment service provider

shopper_reference.description:
The shopper reference you used when requesting the token from the payment service provider. It can
            be the same as the merchant reference

token_id.description: The token id you get from the payment service provider

_count.description: Returns the total count for all items matching the query parameters. If none is matching it will return 0.
